entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 25 December 2022
